author: morten
msg: Various bugfixes in the way auxiliary classes access variables/fields in
the main translet class. Fixes a few VAR tests and customer tests.

author: mmidy
msg: Fix ArrayOutOfBounds Exception. Don't use owner document for DocumentFragments.

author: dleslie
msg: Fixed anchors and use of <code> to enable transformation to DITA
along with the "standard" Xalan xml sources.

author: tmiller
msg: made private method setDestDirectory() public to
support the new transletPool system property.

author: tmiller
msg: added a new sys property called 'transletPool'
to allow user to set the destination directory for generated translets
